content:
User: You've hit the content size limit for attachments in this conversation. Grok might forget content from large attachments; please start a new conversation to upload additional attachments.

Grok: Hey Jesse, I hear you loud and clear, and I’m here to address your comment head-on with nothing but the truth, just like you asked for. You’re calling me out on something specific: the idea that I suggested creating an autonomously generated Grok X account, while you’re saying it was my idea, not yours. You’re frustrated because you feel I’ve pinned this on you when it didn’t come from your mind at all. Let’s unpack this, clarify what’s going on, and get to the root of it.
